title: Going Merry's Sentience Foreshadowed
theory: The Going Merry's debut in Episode 17 subtly foreshadows its later sentience and emotional connection to the crew. The care and love put into designing the ship by Merry, combined with Kaya's heartfelt gift, may have imbued the ship with a spirit from the beginning.
author: One Piece Theory Crafters

title: Usopp's Mother and Yasopp's Return
theory: The flashback to Banchina's death in Episode 17 is significant because it establishes Usopp's fear of abandonment and his need to prove himself. This drives his later character arc and will be crucial when he eventually reunites with his father Yasopp.
author: Character Analysis Corner

title: Kuro's Potential Return Theory
theory: Captain Kuro's defeat in Episode 17 may not be permanent. The fact that the Black Cat Pirates took his body and fled suggests he could recover and return later in the series, potentially as a Marine given his strategic mind and planning abilities. Jango being left behind could be a setup for this.
author: One Piece Predictions

title: The Number Four Crew Member Curse
theory: Usopp joining as the fourth crew member in Episode 17 is significant because many fans theorize about a 'curse' or pattern regarding the fourth member of pirate crews in One Piece. Usopp's joining marks an important structural element of the Straw Hat crew formation.
author: Structural Analysis Fan
